#summary DKPro Core 1.7.0 release notes

We are pleased to announce the release of 

DKPro Core, version 1.7.0 (ASL & GPL)

a collection of interoperable software components for natural language
processing (NLP) based on the Apache UIMA framework. 

   * http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl
   * http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-gpl

== New API modules ==

   * api.io - new IOB encoder;

== New components ==

   * hunpos - wrapper for hunpos, a HMM pos tagger;
   * textnormalizer - extension of umlautnormalizer module, having more components for text normalization;

== New I/O modules/components ==

   * Support for CoNLL 2000 format;

Further highlights in this release include:

   * Support to Stanford CoreNLP caseless models;
   * Upgrade to !LanguageTools 2.4;
   * Upgrade to Stanford CoreNLP 3.3.0;
   * Support for !MaltParser's Persian model;
   * Upgrade to UIMA 2.5.0;
   * Upgrade to Commons Compress 1.7;
   * Support for MSTParser's Croatian model;
